options.name: Default

name: The Bracket
description: This is a swag style lamp that hangs from a wall mounted bracket.  The bulb is a vintage reproduction 60 watt Edison bulb (included).  The wire is braided and fabric wrapped.  This lamp is available with a porcelain keyless socket or a antiqued brass socket that has a switch at the bulb.  Only order the porcelain keyless socket if your outlets are controlled by an external light switch.  These are great for apartments because they're mounted using two nails and simply plug into a free socket.

options.name: Default
Default

name: The Cage
description:
This is "The Cage" floor lamp by Caged Moth Lighting Co.  
The vintage reproduction Edison bulb is housed inside a steel cage (available in antique brass and unfinished steel).  The lamp is turned on/off at the socket (available in antique brass, satin nickel, and black).  The lamp's base is built using raw/unfinished industrial iron and steel pipe.  The cord is braided, fabric-wrapped, and available in 3 colors.  Felt pads are on all four feet so the lamp is safe to display on any surface.

Specifications:
60 watt radio tube-style bulb
120 Voltage Interior use only
Steel bulb cage available
Height:  6'
Braided fabric-covered wire 
3/4 inner diameter pipe base
Medium base E-26 socket

Our lamps and fixtures are made to order for each customer.  Every piece is unique, and minor differences are to be expected.  This listing is for one lamp.  If there's something you'd like to tweak about this design, click on the contact link at the top of the page and send me an email detailing your idea.  I'll get back to you with a quoted price for your custom design.

name: The Mason
description:
This is "The Mason" table lamp by Caged Moth Lighting Co.  
The vintage reproduction radio tube-style bulb is housed inside a removable pint mason jar.  A fully functioning dimmer is on the cord allowing you to adjust the brightness, and switch the power on/off.  The lamp's base is built using raw/unfinished industrial iron and steel pipe.  Felt pads are on all four feet so the lamp is safe to display on any surface.

Specifications:
40 watt radio tube-style bulb
120 voltage (interior use only)
Height:  19"
1/2 inner diameter pipe base
Medium base E-26 socket

All of our lamps are made to order for each customer.  Every piece is unique, and minor differences are to be expected.  This listing is for one lamp.  If there's something you'd like to tweak about this design, click on the contact link at the top of the page and send me an email detailing your idea.  I'll get back to you with a quoted price for your custom design.
